black-iron-tavern.title: Black Iron Tavern
black-iron-tavern.content: The most popular tavern in the Lower District. Known for its bitter ale and loud patrons.
black-iron-tavern.lore: The most popular tavern in the Lower District. Known for its bitter ale and loud patrons.

eldrin-the-wise.title: Eldrin the Wise

connections.label: Often found at the corner table

eldrin-the-wise.content:
An elderly mage who knows more than he lets on. He spends most of his time reading dusty scrolls.

He is currently investigating the [[The Missing Heirloom]].
eldrin-the-wise.lore:
An elderly mage who knows more than he lets on. He spends most of his time reading dusty scrolls.

He is currently investigating the [[The Missing Heirloom]].

vaelen-the-stern.title: Captain Vaelen
vaelen-the-stern.content: A highly disciplined guard captain with a scar across her left eye. She has no patience for tavern brawls.
vaelen-the-stern.lore: A highly disciplined guard captain with a scar across her left eye. She has no patience for tavern brawls.

gilded-hand.title: The Gilded Hand
gilded-hand.content: The most powerful merchant guild in the realm. They control the flow of gold and secrets.
gilded-hand.lore: The most powerful merchant guild in the realm. They control the flow of gold and secrets.

forest-dragon.title: Ancient Forest Dragon
forest-dragon.content: A massive beast whose scales are indistinguishable from moss and leaves. It protects the heart of the woods.
forest-dragon.lore: A massive beast whose scales are indistinguishable from moss and leaves. It protects the heart of the woods.

sky-prophecy.title: Prophecy of the Shattered Sky
sky-prophecy.content: An ancient text predicting a time when the stars will fall and the heavens will break apart.
sky-prophecy.lore: An ancient text predicting a time when the stars will fall and the heavens will break apart.

the-missing-heirloom.title: The Missing Heirloom
the-missing-heirloom.content:
A valuable family ring has gone missing from the Mayor's estate.

Rumor has it that someone from the [[Black Iron Tavern]] was seen near the estate that night.
the-missing-heirloom.lore:
A valuable family ring has gone missing from the Mayor's estate.

Rumor has it that someone from the [[Black Iron Tavern]] was seen near the estate that night.
